featureDescription: Number of bathrooms in the house (½ and ¾ baths are partial bathrooms).
Area of the interior space in units of thousands of square feet.
Overall rating of the house's physical condition, on a scale from 1 (poor) to 5 (excellent).
Building and construction quality rating (4 is lowest, 13 is highest).
Distance from the house to the city center in miles.

featureName: Number of years since the house was built.

featureDescription: The total interior floor space of the building
isNumerical: measured in thousands of square feet.

featureDescription: The functional category of the building (e.g., education, office, residential).
Outdoor air temperature at the time of measurement
The hour of the day when the energy usage was recorded (0 = midnight
The day of the week when the energy usage was recorded.
The employee's work arrangement, such as Hybrid (some remote, some in-person), Remote, or In-person.
The employee's education level, such as Primary School, Bachelor’s Degree (B.A., B.S., B.Eng., etc.).
The number of years of work experience in the industry.
The employee's job title, such as Developer, Product Manager, or Designer.
The size of the organization, such as 2–9 employees, or 10,000+ employees.
The employee's work country, for example: United States of America, Singapore, or France.
